creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
I suggest we drop reports package from JMeter.
I wonder if it is used by anybody as AFAIK we never had any report of issue in it, I have never seen any use of it through all blog I have read and I don't even see how it can be used.

Maybe we could ask on mailing list if anybody uses it before removing it.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hi,
Shall I delete the report package sources or is this enough ?

Thanks

(In reply to Philippe Mouawad from comment #3)
> Hi,
> Shall I delete the report package sources or is this enough ?

I don't see any point in keeping the sources.

If anyone wants them, they can be recovered from SVN.

However it might be worth creating an SVN branch just before removing them.
